parameters.name: AlertSetting
parameters.description: The alert settings. Valid value: INHERITED, which indicates that the Cloud Backup client sends alert notifications by using the same method configured for the backup vault.

parameters.name: CrossAccountRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the Resource Access Management (RAM) role that is created within the source Alibaba Cloud account and assigned to the current Alibaba Cloud account to authorize the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountType
parameters.description:
The backup type. Valid values:

- **SELF_ACCOUNT**: Data is backed up within the same Alibaba Cloud account.
- **CROSS_ACCOUNT**: Data is backed up across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the source Alibaba Cloud account that authorizes the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: EcsInstanceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the ECS instances that host the SAP HANA instance to be registered. Cloud Backup installs backup clients on the specified ECS instances.

parameters.name: HanaName
parameters.description: The name of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: Host
parameters.description: The private or internal IP address of the host where the primary node of the SAP HANA instance resides.

parameters.name: InstanceNumber
parameters.description: The instance number of the SAP HANA system.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password that is used to connect with the SAP HANA database.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The security identifier (SID) of the SAP HANA database. For more information, see [How to find sid user and instance number of HANA db?](https://answers.sap.com/questions/555192/how-to-find-sid-user-and-instance-number-of-hana-d.html?spm=a2c4g.11186623.0.0.55c34b4ftZeXNK).

parameters.name: UseSsl
parameters.description: Specifies whether to connect with the SAP HANA database over Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The username of the SYSTEMDB database.

parameters.name: ValidateCertificate
parameters.description: Specifies whether to verify the SSL certificate of the SAP HANA database.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
